originalText.text: I cannot recommend Dr. Chirs highly enough! As someone who has struggled with chronic pain for years, I found Dr. Chirs’ treatment very helpful in managing my pane. Dr.Chris took the time to listen attentively to my concerns and medical history and provided valuable insights into lifestyle changes and self-care practices that complemented the acupuncture treatments. His compassionate care and dedication to his patients are truly remarkable. If you're seeking effective pain relief and holistic healing, look no further than Dr. Chris’ acupuncture practice.

originalText.text:
Dr. Chris Bae at Sungsim Acupuncture has helped me tremendously. He is extremely knowledgeable, caring, kind, and an excellent acupuncturist! His choice of staff is also wonderful. I feel so fortunate to have found this place especially since they accept my health insurance and I would not have been able to get this needed treatment if not for that.

One year plus later of being in the care of Dr. Chris Bae at some Sungsim Acupuncture and I still stand by my earlier review.(that he is extremely knowledgeable, caring, kind, and an excellent acupuncturist!) Whatever your condition, he will help you. I feel very fortunate to have found him for my specific problems. He takes your temperature, heart rate, blood pressure, and organ assessment  before treatment, and occasionally gives you needed herbs, which for me have always helped. But what amazes me is how good he is at applying the needles in the right places with the right amount of pressure and depth. In general you will be and feel well cared for at Sungsim -I highly recommend!

originalText.text: Where do I even start, i went to Doctor Chris to get acupuncture treatment for my hands, foot and lower back. I received great acupuncture treatment but I also brought up to the doctor that I been suffering from chronic cough, shortness of breath and acid reflux. I was totally shocked when doctor Chris said he can also take care of that. I started all of treatments like 6 months ago and I’m so happy to say that all my illness that I suffered for years are gone. Doctor Chris got some kind of magic in his hands. Also I love the staff and environment everyone is so friendly and welcoming. Doctor Chris is the solution for all the problems. He is the best.

originalText.text:
I have been utilizing Dr Chris acupuncture for over a year or so. When the pandinic came around March I discontinued all appointments because I had a deep fear of getting in contact with the coronavirus19. I went into isolation at home and rarely went outside of my home. So, last week I made an appointment with Sungsim on Broadway and was very pleased. Today Monday I had another appointment. To my amusement, just when I thought it couldn't get any better. However, I had one of the best face down experience ever. The service was so in depth and "NO PAIN NO GAIN' I walked several blocks home without having to stop and sit. I have know pain in my legs or back. I feel great.
Thanks Dr. Chris, so much
Evangeline Willis
